Name: Your journal!
Description: Objectives and story progress are on the right-hand side. Mouse over an icon or click on the category heading to see details.

Name: Your officers!
Description: Left-click and drag to assign officers, or right-click to speak to them. Assigned officers give ability bonuses.

Name: Shops
Description: Here you can buy fuel, supplies, ship equipment and trade goods. Shops are displayed on the left. Click on one to see its wares.

Name: Echoes
Description: London's currency is the Echo. To earn money, explore the map and bring back port reports and treasures. You can trade, too, but exploration and stories are much more profitable.

Name: Setting zail
Description: Click the launch button to leave port.

Name: Movement
Description: Use the WSAD keys to move. Tap W twice to reach max speed. Tap S to slow down or reverse. And use the A and D keys to steer.

Name: Terror
Description: When you see green running lights on the ship, you're in the dark, and your crew's terror will increase. Watch the pips on the terror indicator. It increases faster when you're far from land. Don't let it reach 100.

Name: Headlights
Description: Your prow light can be turned on or off. Leaving it on reduces the rate at which you gain Terror, but makes you more visible to enemies.

Name: Fragments
Description:
You receive Fragments when you discover new places. Acquire enough of them and you'll gain a Secret. 

You can use Secrets to improve your captain's skills (by talking to Officers), or for some key stories.

Name: Docking
Description: To visit this port, click the dock button.

Name: Secrets
Description: You can spend Secrets to improve your abilities. To do so, right-click on an officer to start a conversation.

Name: Something Awaits You
Description: After a short time at zee, a lamp icon will appear above the log book. It means that opportunities await you at the next port.

Name: Ports
Description: That circle of light is a port! Go there for stories.

Name: Zee-bat
Description: When you are far from land, click on the zee-bat icon. It will search for undiscovered locations nearby.

Name: Zee-bat
Description: Your zee-bat has discovered something! Click on the message to mark the location on your chart.

Name: Chart
Description: Click on the chart icon to view your discoveries so far.

Name: Keyboard shortcuts
Description: Most icons have keyboard shortcuts - mouse over to see them.

Name: Combat
Description:
You've encountered an opponent! The red arc shows the range of your deck gun. Keep the enemy in range while your crew works out a firing solution. 

This will happen faster if you keep the enemy in your prow light. The deck gun will be highlighted as your crew make progress towards a firing solution. (Press space or close the tutorial to continue.)

Name: Full power to the engines!
Description: If you ever need an extra turn of speed, clicking the full power icon will add another barrel of fuel to the engine. This is occasionally hazardous.

Name: Firing solution
Description: Your firing solution is ready! To attack your opponent, click on the deck weapon.

Name: Claiming your prize
Description: Congratulations! You've defeated your opponent. Move to the site of their demise to salvage something.

Name: Hull Damage
Description: Your hull is damaged! You can repair it in London's drydocks, or at zee by clicking the repair button. Repairs at zee are slow and consume supplies.

Name: Supplies
Description: You're low on supplies. Once you run out your crew will begin to starve. You can buy more in certain ports.

Name: Fuel
Description: You're low on fuel. Buy more before you run out, or you will be stranded in the dark.

Name: Crew
Description: You've lost a crew member. Lose too many and your speed will be reduced; lose them all and you too will die. You can always engage more in London, and sometimes other ports.

Name: Terror
Description: Your crew's terror is reaching dangerous levels. You can lower it in certain ports, and slow its rise by staying close to land and keeping your prow light on.

Name: Damage
Description: Careful! Your hull just took damage from a collision. If you have trouble steering around rocks, try slowing down or going backwards with the S key.

Name: Hold
Description: Your hold is almost full. If you exceed your maximum cargo capacity while outside port, you'll have to throw some overboard.

Name: Hull Damage
Description: Your hull is below half strength! Enemy attacks may now do additional damage to your terror, crew, or supplies.

Name: Horn
Description: Pressing the H key will blow your horn. This has no useful function, and may provoke nearby zee-beasts or hostile vessels.

Name: Such wealth!
Description: You've earned enough Echoes to buy better equipment for your ship! Click on the shops tab. A new engine or deck weapon would be a good first purchase.

Name: Well provisioned
Description: You are now well provisioned! Try venturing further from London. The risks are greater, but so are the rewards.

Name: Submerging
Description: You're now the proud owner of a zubmersible ship! Use the 'Submerge' button to convert your ship into a zubmarine. Use the same button when underwater to resurface.

Name: Sonar
Description: Sonar lets you see beneath the zee. When underwater, it highlights nearby obstacles, discoveries and creatures with a dim blue glow. You'll have to get closer to find out what they are
